thread.title: Post Pregnancy Announcement, Beyonce Will Rock Grammys 2017 With A Scintillating Performance! - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: Post Pregnancy Announcement, Beyonce Will Rock Grammys 2017 With A Scintillating Performance! - Indiatimes.com

title: Post Pregnancy Announcement, Beyonce Will Rock Grammys 2017 With A Scintillating Performance! - Indiatimes.com
text:
Bhavya Sadhwani February 05, 2017 No one and I repeat, NO ONE saw this coming! While the United States of America is still reeling over President Trump’s Muslim Ban, singer Beyonce decided to brighten up her fans’ world with a happy news. Queen Bey, as she is fondly called, took to Instagram to announce that she is pregnant with twins on Wednesday. The portrait shows the 'Formation' singer in her full pregnant glory. With flowers all around and a beautiful veil on her head, Beyonce captioned this mesmerizing picture as, “We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes.” We would like to share our love and happiness. We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. - The Carters A photo posted by Beyoncé (@beyonce) on Feb 1, 2017 at 10:39am PST This piece of news rocked the social world, so much so, that ‘BEYONCE IS HAVING TWINS’, in all caps mind you, trending on Twitter. In fact, Guinness World Records even announced that Beyonce has shattered the previous record of Selena Gomez’s picture which holds 6.3 million likes with her baby bump picture which has over 9.7 million likes! All Hail, Queen Bey. sheknows.com Even her first announcement was quite epic. Right after her performance at the MTV awards 2011, Beyonce revealed her pregnancy without even using words! Check it out for yourself: Apart from her dreamy personal life, even professionally Beyonce is soaring heights. The 'Lemonade' singer is leading Grammys 2017 with a whopping 9 nominations!
